name: Robotron (Harley Laurie)
description:
This is my clone of the classic arcade game Robotron 2084.  
I just made this for fun, I really enjoyed playing the original Robotron back in the day.  I think its got amazing design for something which came so early in the industry.  
I'll keep working on this for some more time in the future to try and get it close to the real game as much as I'm able to.  
You can find the source code on my github https://github.com/Swaelo/Swaelo-Robotron  
If you had any questions or things you wanted to discuss the best way to get in contact would be through Discord, you can message me on their at Swaelo#7484
